scripts.build: if pwd | grep --quiet /module$; then cd ../botpress/modules/channel-slack-av ; fi && node "$(pwd)/../../build/module-builder/bin/entry" build --path="$(pwd)"
scripts.watch: if pwd | grep --quiet /module$; then cd ../botpress/modules/channel-slack-av ; fi && node "$PWD/../../build/module-builder/bin/entry" watch --path="$PWD"
scripts.package: if pwd | grep --quiet /module$; then cd ../botpress/modules/channel-slack-av ; fi && node "$PWD/../../build/module-builder/bin/entry" package --path="$PWD"
